title: Mac FPS Drops
body:
I have been playing with my Macbook Pro Mid-2012 for over 3 years and have only started to recently get massive FPS drops. 
I am now playing on 30-45 FPS instead of the usual 80-100 FPS. I don't seem to know why or how it did this. Is it the new patches? Or something with my computer? I don't know much about computer parts or anything like that and am looking for help. 

I play on very low EVERYTHING and still get this FPS.

Here is my macbook's specs : 

8GB of RAM
2.9 GHz intel core i7
Intel HD Graphics 4000 1536 MB

Any help would be appreciated, thanks!

replies.body:
Same for me here. Playing on my mac since 3 years without problems.
Past days having high FPS drop, sometimes unplayable (under 20 fps).
Macbook specs:
2,6 GHz Intel Core i7
16GB RAM
NVIDIA GeForce GTÂ 750M 2048 Mo

Nothing weird on my mac on already checked everything.
I'm pretty sure it's about the last MAJ, since it consumes > 150% CPU 
even on launcher since this MAJ.

Your specs look pretty good, so no issues there. You may be having this FPS drop due to some weird settings that were reset after an update, but let's be sure to hit the common causes with this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Hit me back up if you're still having issues!
